description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Flinders Ranges, Australia. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: South Australia Flinders Ranges Outback Glamping with Daily Breakfast & A$50 Dining Credit
hotels.description: Sleep under a blanket of stars in one of the outback's most iconic camping spots at Discovery Resorts - Wilpena Pound, Ikara-Flinders Ranges National Park’s only resort. Home to the majestic Wilpena Pound, an 800-million-year-old natural amphitheatre, this Flinders Ranges safari-style glamping stay invites you to discover a spectacular feat of nature that covers eight times the area of Uluru. Surround yourself with creature comforts amid 95,000 hectares of rugged mountains, dramatic gorges and abundant wildlife with incredible onsite facilities including a swimming pool, restaurant, bar and a tour centre, where you can book 4WD tours, guided Aboriginal culture walks and bucket-list worthy scenic flights over the incredible landscape. Visit between May and October for the rare chance to witness a breathtaking natural phenomenon, when floodwaters from Queensland and South Australia flow into Kati Thanda-Lake Eyre, transforming the vast salt bed into an outback oasis.

hotels.title: Flinders Ranges Eco-Luxury near Wilpena Pound
hotels.description: Experience the majesty of South Australia’s rugged outback with a stay at Rawnsley Park Station - an eco-luxury property at the foot of stunning Wilpena Pound. A hugely significant Indigenous cultural site, this magnificent natural amphitheatre is the centrepiece of Ikara-Flinders Ranges National Park and the backdrop for this unique outback retreat. Soak up the breathtaking beauty of the ancient landscape as you enjoy the incredible onsite facilities of this working sheep farm, including a woolshed-turned-renowned-restaurant and a refreshing swimming pool with unparalleled views. Rawnsley Park Station is the perfect destination to embrace the rugged beauty of the outback and separate yourself from hectic city life. From hikes through Wilpena Pound and along the Brachina Gorge Geological Trail to admiring significant sites such as Arkaroo Rock, Bunyeroo Gorge and Sacred Canyon - the possibilities for exploration are endless. With miles upon miles of sprawling terrain at your disposal, days here will be filled with incredible adventures and nights will be spent admiring the outback's starry skies.

seo.title: Hoteles en Flinders Ranges - Australia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Flinders Ranges, Australia con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
